physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order. There is an index at the end of the file (folios 96-99). The index is arranged chronologically and refers to documents within the file.
The foliation starts on first and ends on the last folio of the file. The numbering 1-99 is in pencil in top right corner of recto, folio 47 is missing or skipped.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Political Resident at Bushire, the Political Agent at Bahrain, the British Ministry of Fuel and Power, Bahrain Petroleum Limited (BAPCO), transmitting monthly reports, including data and tonnage on refinery operations and on petroleum product exports during 1948-1950.There is an index at the end of the file (folios 96-99).
